pkgmetadata.longdescription: Penalized Regression with Second-Generation P-Values // Implementation of penalized regression with second-generation p-values for variable selection. The algorithm can handle linear regression, GLM, and Cox regression. S3 methods print(), summary(), coef(), predict(), and plot() are available for the algorithm. Technical details can be found at Zuo et al. (2021) doi:10.1080/00031305.2021.1946150.
